name: DSM-Firmenich - Skin Microbiome Cosmetic Ingredients
description: DSM-Firmenich offers innovative skin microbiome cosmetic ingredients designed to fight dryness and support skin health. Their formulations boost Staphylococcus epidermidis levels, a beneficial skin bacterium crucial for barrier function and moisture retention. Advanced research-driven approach to microbiome skincare.
notes: DSM-Firmenich formed through merger of DSM and Firmenich, combining expertise in nutrition, health, and beauty. Focus on boosting Staphylococcus epidermidis represents targeted, science-based microbiome approach. Major player with extensive R&D capabilities.
